info.description: Public API of Diebold Nixdorf for Banking Core Systems integration
info.title: DN Open Backend API

get.summary: Get token required for a transaction.
get.description: Retrieves a session Token which can be used for a transaction.

post.summary: Get the account list of a consumer
post.description: Retrieves a list of all accounts of a consumer

post.summary: Returns detail information of an account
post.description: Returns detail information of an account.

200.description: OK. Detail information of an account.

post.summary: Returns detailed information of a consumer
post.description: Returns detailed information of a consumer.

200.description: OK. Detailed information of a consumer.

post.summary: Returns the list of all the transactions processed in an account.
post.description: Returns the list of all the transactions processed in an account.

200.description: OK. List of all the transactions processed in an account.

post.summary: Returns list of Holds on an account.
post.description: Returns list of Holds on an account.

200.description: OK. List of Hold on an account.

post.summary: Returns list of Account Warnings on an account.
post.description: Returns list of Account Warnings on an account.

200.description: OK. List of Account Warnings on an account.

post.summary: Returns list of Account Warnings on every account.
post.description: Returns list of Account Warnings on every account.

200.description: OK. List of Account Warnings on every account.

post.summary: Returns list of Cards of an account.
post.description: Returns list of Cards of an account.

200.description: OK. List of Cards of an account.
OK. Returns details of a check.

post.summary: Returns a list of consumer warnings on an account.
post.description: Returns a list of consumer warnings on an account.

200.description: OK. List of consumer warnings on an account.

post.summary: Returns the list of all the transactions that are yet to be in an account.
post.description: Returns the list of all the transactions that are yet to be in an account.

200.description: OK. List of all the transactions that are yet to be in an account.

post.summary: Returns the list of all ofac accounts.
post.description: Returns the list of all ofac accounts.

200.description: OK. List of all ofac accounts.

post.summary: performs transactions that consists of cash deposits, check deposits, cash withdrawals and cash checks
post.description: Allows consumers to create teller transactions that consist of cash deposits, check deposits, cash withdrawals, and cash checks. It also allow consumers to add teller currency transactions.

500.description: Error while performing currency transaction reporting operation

post.summary: Posts details of Cass Counter changes
post.description: Posts details of Cass Counter changes

version.name: version
version.description: Version of DN Open Backend API being used.

operation.name: operation
operation.description: Name of the operation that is requested. eg. credit

initiatingPartyId.name: initiatingPartyId
initiatingPartyId.description: Identifier of the party that has initiated this transaction, in this case Diebold Nixdorf's ID.

productName.name: productName
productName.description: The name of the product which is consuming the service (business product name).

initiatingPartyName.name: initiatingPartyName
initiatingPartyName.description: The name of the initiating party.

schema.description: A timestamp as defined by date-time - RFC3339. Please see: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339

referenceId.name: referenceId
referenceId.description: Unique identifier for the transaction request.

sessionToken.name: token
sessionToken.description: Unique identifier for a session. This token can vary per request or can be re-generated on a scheduled basis like every 1 hour or 1 day.

authType.name: authType
authType.description: Authentication mechanisam being used.  BASIC_AUTH, TOKEN, NONE

tokenAuthorization.name: Authorization
tokenAuthorization.description: Contains base 64 encoded userName:password string using HTTP Basic Authentication.

authorization.name: Authorization
authorization.description: Contains base 64 encoded userName:password string using HTTP Basic Authentication.

expirationDate.description: Expiry timestamp of the genrated token.

firstName.description: The first name of the account holder.

lastName.description: The last name of the account holder.

name.description: The full name of the account holder. Represents the full name of the individual or name of the business entity if the holder is a business organisation.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the entity holding the account.

receiptId.description: Receipt identification number of the transaction

maxRecords.description: Maximum number of records to fetch.

name.description: The name of the account owner.

confirmationNumber.description: the transaction confirmation number for the transaction to be reversed.

itemMixUsed.description: List of dispensed notes and coins

itemMixTotal.description: list of dispensed notes and coins since last settlement

ErrorCode.description: Error Code Mapping as per Diebold Nixdorf

ErrorMessage.example: Error occured while processing the request

cardState.description: Defines the state of the card (Active, Blocked etc)

pan.description: Primary Account Number (PAN) of the card

track2.description: ISO track 2 issued from the magnetic stripe card or from the ICC

cardSequenceNumber.description: Identify a card or a payment token inside a set of cards with the same PAN

expiryDate.description: Expiry date of the card expressed in YYMM format

bankRoutingId.description:
Contains the BIC (aka. bank identifier code)The BIC - also known as SWIFT-code - as defined by ISO 9362 is required in/for cross border transfers/transactions. Please see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_9362
  This field can also be used to send/receive an ABA RTN (ABA routing transit number) or Canadian TN (Canadian transit number).
  See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Routing_transit_number

name.description: The accunt name of the account

firstName.description: The first name of the account holder.

lastName.description: The last name of the account holder.

name.description: The full name of the account holder. Represents the name of the business entity if the holder is a business organisation.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the entity holding the account.

name.description: The name of the account owner.

zpkGeneration.description: Generation of Zone PIN Key used to encrypt the PIN

suspectedFraud.description: true if check is suspected as fraud.

bankRoutingId.description:
Contains the BIC (aka. bank identifier code)The BIC - also known as SWIFT-code - as defined by ISO 9362 is required in/for cross border transfers/transactions. Please see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_9362
  This field can also be used to send/receive an ABA RTN (ABA routing transit number) or Canadian TN (Canadian transit number).
  See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Routing_transit_number

accountNumber.description:
The account number. The length varies greatly. In Europe defined by ISO 13616/2007
See also:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Bank_Account_Number

Amount.description: The basic type of an amount.

value.description: The amount value of the given currency. As defined by ISO 20022, CurrencyAndAmount.

currency.description:
The currency code as defined by ISO 20022, ActiveCurrencyCode
See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

AmountEUR.description: The basic type of an amount.

ConsumerId.description:
A unique identifier of a consumer (within an external system), which is required to identify the consumer.
    Maybe the consumerId is moreover/also used to authorize the consumer against an external system

taxId.description: The Tax Id of the account.

AccountType.description: | Symbolic name              | Comment                                                        | |----------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------| | NOT_SPECIFIED              | Default value for unknowaccounts.                              | | GIRO                       | Giro account.                                                  | | SAVINGS                    | Savings account. (ISO 8583; MC DE.54->10 / VISA DE.54->10).    | | SECURITIES_DEPOSIT         | Depot of securities (shares and so on).                        | | SAVINGS_SECURITIES_DEPOSIT | Savings securities.                                            | | GIRO_SECURITIES_DEPOSIT    | Giro securities.                                               | | FIXED_TERM_DEPOSIT         | Fixed term deposit.                                            | | CREDIT_CARD                | Credit card account. (ISO 8583; MC DE.54->30 / VISA DE.54->30).| | LOAN                       | An account that covers a credit and its balance and movements. | | MORTGAGE                   | Security for a loan.                                           | | FOREIGN_CURRENCY           | An account that holds money in a foreign curreny.              | | EXTERNAL                   | An account that represents an account of a foreign institution.| | CHECKING                   | Checking account. (ISO 8583; MC DE.54->20 / VISA DE.54->20)    |  | UNIVERSAL                  | ISO 8583; VISA DE.54->40)                                      |  | SPENDING_POWER             | ISO 8583; VISA DE.54->64)                                      |  | FEE_COLLECTION_ACCOUNT     | used to collect fees                                           |  | ATM                        | ATM                                                            | | VENDOR                     | Vendor                                                         | | SHAREHOLDER                | Shareholder                                                    | | GENERAL_LEDGER             | General ledger                                                 | | CASH_RESERVE               | Cash Reserve Line of Credit                                    | | LOAN_DENIAL                | Load denial                                                    | | LEASE                      | Lease                                                          | | CONSUMER_LOAN              | Consumer loan                                                  | | COMMERCIAL_LOAN            | Cemercial loan                                                 | | RETIREMENT_LOAN            | Retirement loan                                                | | EXTERNAL_LOAN              | External loan                                                  | | SHARE                      | Share                                                          | | INDIVIDUAL_RETIREMENT      | Individual Retirement Account(IRA)                             |

CheckType.description: The Check Type value of the check

AccessPermission.description: The Access permission of the Account

value.description: The amount value of the given currency. As defined by ISO 20022, CurrencyAndAmount.

currency.description:
The currency code as defined by ISO 20022, ActiveCurrencyCode
See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

LoanType.description: All the possible account types for LOAN Accounts

Loan.description: Loan balance to be represented in amounts as LOAN_BALANCE

Credit.description: Credit amounts to be represnted in amounts as CREDIT_LIMIT, AVAILABLE_CREDIT, LAST_CHARGE_DUE, INTEREST_PAID_YEAR_TO_DATE, INTEREST_PAID_PREVIOUS_YEAR_TO_DATE, INTEREST_AMOUNT

Payment.description: Payment amounts to be represnted in amounts as REGULAR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, REGULAR_PAYMENT_DUE, PRINCIPAL_BALANCE, PAYOFF_AMOUNT, LAST_PAYMENT_AMOUNT

regularPaymentFrequency.description: Regular payment frequency. This can be Monthly, Weekly etc, for some hosts it is Integer value.

paymentMethod.description: The payment method of this account.

accountName.description: The account name/number which is displayed to the user.

accountNumber.description:
The account number. The length varies greatly. In Europe defined by ISO 13616/2007
See also:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Bank_Account_Number

accountCurrency.description:
The currency code as defined by ISO 20022, ActiveCurrencyCode
See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

accountSubType.description: Returns the "original" backend type of the account. The value is taken from the backend response and put into the response to the client as it is!

branchCode.description: The branch code of the bank

bankCode.description:
Contains the BIC (aka. bank identifier code)
  The BIC - also known as SWIFT-code - as defined by ISO 9362 is required in/for cross border transfers/transactions.
  Please see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_9362
  
  This field can also be used to send/receive an ABA RTN (ABA routing transit number) or Canadian TN (Canadian transit number).
  See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Routing_transit_number

instituteName.description: The name of the institute, identified by the 'bankCode'. This field is always optional as long as it isn't marked as 'required'.

accountNumber.description:
The account number. The length varies greatly. In Europe defined by ISO 13616/2007
See also:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/International_Bank_Account_Number

accountName.description: The account name/number which is displayed to the user.

accountCurrency.description:
The currency code as defined by ISO 20022, ActiveCurrencyCode
See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217
type: string
minLength: 3
maxLength: 3
pattern: '[A-Z]{3,3}'
example: USD

bankCode.description:
Contains the BIC (aka. bank identifier code)
  The BIC - also known as SWIFT-code - as defined by ISO 9362 is required in/for cross border transfers/transactions.
  Please see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_9362
  
  This field can also be used to send/receive an ABA RTN (ABA routing transit number) or Canadian TN (Canadian transit number).
  See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Routing_transit_number

instituteName.description: The name of the institute, identified by the 'bankCode'. This field is always optional as long as it isn't marked as 'required'.

AdditionalProperties.description: Additional properties can be provided within this object

SupplementaryData.description: Additional information incorporated as an extension to the message by mixins based on the transaction type

Date.description:
The date pattern is defined "YYYY-MM-DD", with YYYY as 4-digit year, MM as 2-digit month and DD as 2-digit day of month.
Date string as defined by date-time

streetno.description: The street number of this address.

zipcode.description: The zip code of this city.

countrycode.description:
The ISO 3166 (alpha-3) country code of this address. 
See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3

beneficiaryConsumerId.description: Id of the beneficiary who is a consumer

beneficiaryNonConsumerId.description: Id of the beneficiary who is a non-consumer

Channel.description: Channel through which transaction is initiated.

device.description: Device id. For a list of all 185 possible devices please refer to - http://[xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx]/pce-manuals/ruegen/pdf25/KnowledgeBase/doc/content.html?url=content/html/KnowledgeBase_SRV/SEC_possible_devices.html&search=PCEDeviceConstant

deviceState.description: State of Device OPERATIONAL or NON_OPERATIONAL

currency.description:
The currency code as defined by ISO 20022, ActiveCurrencyCode
See also: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217

release.description: release of document (e.g. newer edition of banknote)
